synopsis.text: While the Fittoa region grapples with the disastrous aftermath of a mass-teleportation event, an unexpected ally emerges for Princess Ariel Anemoi Asura in her quest for the throne. Sylphiette, a skilled combat mage, finds herself inexplicably transported to the royal palace, inadvertently saving Ariel's life and earning a place as her trusted bodyguard. As the pair navigate the treacherous path to power, they must confront the challenges posed by Ariel's ambitious siblings and the enigmatic mage known as "Silent Fitz." In this thrilling tale of political intrigue and magical warfare, the stakes have never been higher for the future of the Asura Kingdom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
